page.title: 04"EXCELSIOR" RECEPTIONIST
page.content: The receptionist has to work shifts: an early shift from 7am till 3pm,or a late shift from 6pm till 11pm. Most days for a receptionist are extremely busy with telephones ringing non-stop and people constantly at the desk as they arrive or depart.The main duties of a receptionist are to make sure guests arrive safely and enjoy their stay. "I particularly enjoy dealing with guests.But there are exceptions-for example when guests have a little too much to drink and try to annoy me while I am working." A receptionist needs to have patience and a pleasant personality.At the "Excelsior",which is situated beside Glasgow Airport,the receptionists meet lots of famous people,from Duchesses to pop-stars,and everybody in between.
